title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.1 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.1 - Preamble

State Regulations

The traffic regulations promulgated by the college are
intended to provide safe usage of campus roadways and maximum storage of
student vehicles with a minimum of interference with necessary services. To
meet this purpose, the administration asks the students' cooperation in obeying
not only the letter but also the spirit of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
580.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
